text: Would love to hear additional thoughts on it! Please post on Discourse though so we have a record. :hugging_face: Thanks!

elements.text: Would love to hear additional thoughts on it! Please post on Discourse though so we have a record.

text: I've spent some time on number verification and table understanding in PDF documents recently at work, mainly focused on financial and medical related fields. After trying many different open source tools, we found non of them are perfect. We turned to an internal tool developed by the O365 team in the end, written in C#, much more powerful. However it works only on windows currently and no plan to open source in the near future.
